actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To create jobs and promote fair trade by increasing duties on certain foreign goods imported into the United States.
short_title: Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act

summary.text: Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to increase the duty on polyurethane sponges. Prescribes requirements for the duty treatment of steel wool cleaning pads.

titles.title: Creating Manufacturing Jobs and Promoting Fair Trade Act
To create jobs and promote fair trade by increasing duties on certain foreign goods imported into the United States.
